course_modal_ip.name: username
course_modal_ip.description: The username of the learner on the edX platform

course_modal_ip.name: modal_ip
course_modal_ip.description: The most frequently used IP address of the learner

course_modal_ip.name: ip_count
course_modal_ip.description: The number of times the modal IP address has been used by the learner throughout the course

course_modal_ip.name: n_different_ip
course_modal_ip.description: The number of different IP addresses the learner has used throughout the course

description: Table generated with SQL query file course_modal_ip.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the IP address analytics for each user.
